name: Pangaea
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: I have started the peace, and now I want to end it!
attacked: You think you can defeat me? hmph!
defeated: I will defeat you in another time!
introduction: Hello strangers, I am Panji I, King of the Pangaeans
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: As a matter of fact I too grew tired from this endless fights.
tradeRequest: We would be honored if you accept this trade offer.
